verbose_text: SIRT1 overepression could also induce hepatic CYP7A1, decrease hepatic cholesterol and via upregulation of the LDLR pathway reduce plasma LDL-C [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: SIRT1 overepression could also induce hepatic CYP7A1, decrease hepatic cholesterol and via upregulation of the LDLR pathway reduce plasma LDL-C
